title: Fires and Foul Fumes (6R62)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	4
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Regroup: Discard 4 [Isengard] orcs to wound a companion 4 times (except the Ring-bearer).
Lore:	”'One of them… got caught in a spray of some liquid fire and burned like a torch: a horrible sight.'”
Rarity:	R
